name: Eura 7
description: Eura7 is a Digital Agency based in Poland. The company has specialized in designing and implementing corporate and marketing websites since 1999. They have successfully conducted projects with many market leaders such as Yves Rocher, IKEA, Hugo Boss, Esprit, Siemens, and KTM. Since 2012 they have been organizing a series of workshops and conferences known as INTERNET ASAP.
